snippet.title: Len's Island Official Teaser-Trailer
snippet.description:
Gain Exclusive Access to Early Game Builds on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/flowstudio
Play Len's Island on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1335830
Subscribe to Len's Island: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCumxJsaDUAuzVG24NruTBSQ?sub_confirmation=1
Join Len's Island Development Discord: https://discord.com/invite/tgXdS9A

Twitter: https://twitter.com/LensIsland
Len's Island: https://www.lensisland.com/
Flow Studio: https://www.flowgamestudio.com/

Len's Island Game Description: 
Build, fight, farm and explore. Experience your own path. Whether it's building the home of your dreams, tending to your crops and watching the sun go down; or explore the mysteries of the Island and the darkness underneath, but you may want to take a sword with you.

Developed by Flow Studio
Flow Studio is a game development studio based in Brisbane,  Australia. We are currently developing Len's Island, an open-world action-adventure game with building, farming, crafting, and survival game mechanics. Len's Island is built in the Unity 3D game engine.
